requestStructure: [{"uuid":"c976251a-3979-44fd-b316-256d8e0fec34","text":"A Visualforce page loads slowly due to large amount of data it displays.\\r\\n\\r\\nWhich strategy can a developer use to improve the performance?  \\r\\n","type":"Single","exam":"PD2","questionSet":"1","options":[{"text":"Use a transient keyword for the List variables used in the custom controller","correct":false},{"text":"Use Javascript to move data processing to the browser instead of the controller","correct":false},{"text":"Use an <apex:actionPoller> in the page to load all of the data asynchronously","correct":false},{"text":"Use lazy loading to load the data on demand, Instead of in the controller's constructor","correct":true}]},{"uuid":"c059284d-e8af-45d3-96f8-c7bf75bfa998","text":"After a Platform Event is defined in a Salesforce org, events can be published via which two mechanisms?\\r\\n\\r\\nChoose 2 answers\\r\\n","type":"Double","exam":"PD2","questionSet":"1","options":[{"text":"Internal Apps can use Outbound Messages","correct":false},{"text":"Internal Apps can use Process Builder","correct":true},{"text":"External Apps require the standard Streaming API","correct":false},{"text":"External Apps use an API to publish event messages","correct":true}]},{"uuid":"27a8722e-a0fa-476c-ab0e-f476450172c4","text":"A lead developer for a Salesforce organization needs to developer a page-centric application that allows user to interact with multiple objects related to a Contact. The application needs to implement a third-party Javascript framework such as Angular, and must be made available in both Classic and Lightning Experience\\r\\n\\r\\nGiven these requirements, what is the recommended solution to developer the application?\\r\\n","type":"Single","exam":"PD2","questionSet":"1","options":[{"text":"Aura Components","correct":false},{"text":"Lightning Web Components","correct":false},{"text":"Visualforce","correct":false},{"text":"Lightning Experience Builder","correct":true}]},{"uuid":"380894e3-405f-4add-b29d-b5978bf9a2e0","text":"Universal Containers wants to use an external Web Service provided by a third-party vendor to validate that shipping and billing address are correct. The current vendor uses basic password authentication, but Universal Containers might switch to a different vendor who uses OAuth.\\r\\n\\r\\nWhich approach follows best practices and allows Universal Containers to switch vendors without updating the code to handle authentication?\\r\\n","type":"Single","exam":"PD2","questionSet":"1","options":[{"text":"Custom Setting (List)","correct":false},{"text":"Named Credential","correct":true},{"text":"Custom Metadata","correct":false},{"text":"Dynamic Endpoint","correct":false}]},{"uuid":"952d88b1-1e78-40e0-9208-ff6749b306bc","text":"Which code statement includes an Apex method named updateAccounts in the class AccountController for use in a Lightning web component?\\r\\n","type":"Single","exam":"PD2","questionSet":"1","options":[{"text":"import updateAccounts from '@salesforce/apex/AccountController';","correct":false},{"text":"import updateAccounts from 'AccountController';","correct":false},{"text":"import updateAccounts from 'AccountController.updateAccounts';","correct":false},{"text":"import updateAccounts from '@salesforce/apex/AccountController.updateAccounts';","correct":true}]}]
